languages.text: {n}Вы сознаете, что подверглись воздействию артефакта, но детали произошедшего вам не ясны. Наступившая тишина кажется глубокой, как колодец, и полной темного ужаса, как колодезная тьма.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы сознаете, что подверглись воздействию артефакта, но детали произошедшего вам не ясны. Наступившая тишина кажется глубокой, как колодец, и полной темного ужаса, как колодезная тьма.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You can tell you have fallen under the effects of the artefact, but you are unsure of the details of what just transpired. The remaining silence feels as deep as a well and full of the same dark terror as the blackness inside one.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы сознаете, что подверглись воздействию артефакта, но детали произошедшего вам не ясны. Наступившая тишина кажется глубокой, как колодец, и полной темного ужаса, как колодезная тьма.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You can tell you have fallen under the effects of the artifact, but you are unsure of the details of what just transpired. The remaining silence feels as deep as a well and full of the same dark terror as the blackness inside one.{/n}

{n}You can tell you have fallen under the effects of the artifact, but you are unsure of the details of what just transpired. The remaining silence feels as deep as a well and full of the same dark terror as the blackness inside one.{/n}

{n}You can tell you have fallen under the effects of the artifact, but you are unsure of the details of what just transpired. The remaining silence feels as deep as a well and full of the same dark terror as the blackness inside one.{/n}

{n}You can tell you have fallen under the effects of the artifact, but you are unsure of the details of what just transpired. The remaining silence feels as deep as a well and full of the same dark terror as the blackness inside one.{/n}

{n}You can tell you have fallen under the effects of the artefact, but you are unsure of the details of what just transpired. The remaining silence feels as deep as a well and full of the same dark terror as the blackness inside one.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アーティファクトの影響を受けてしまったことはわかるが、何が起こったのか詳しいことはわからない。その場に残された沈黙は井戸のように深く、その漆黒と同じように暗い恐怖に満ちているように感じる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can tell you have fallen under the effects of the artefact, but you are unsure of the details of what just transpired. The remaining silence feels as deep as a well and full of the same dark terror as the blackness inside one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遺物の影響を受けてしまったことはわかるが、何が起こったのか詳しいことはわからない。その場に残された沈黙は井戸のように深く、その漆黒と同じように暗い恐怖に満ちているように感じる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你很确信，你受到了这件造物的影响，但你无法确定刚刚究竟发生了什么事情。残存的寂静宛如一口深井，井中充斥着如黑暗一般深邃的恐怖。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can tell you have fallen under the effects of the artefact, but you are unsure of the details of what just transpired. The remaining silence feels as deep as a well and full of the same dark terror as the blackness inside one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你很确信，你受到了这件造物的影响，但你无法确定刚刚究竟发生了什么事情。残存的寂静宛如一口深井，井中充斥着如黑暗一般深邃的恐怖。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sabes que el artefacto te ha afectado, pero no comprendes los detalles de lo sucedido. El silencio subsiguiente es tan profundo como un pozo y está lleno de un terror tan siniestro como la negrura del fondo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can tell you have fallen under the effects of the artefact, but you are unsure of the details of what just transpired. The remaining silence feels as deep as a well and full of the same dark terror as the blackness inside one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sabes que el artefacto te ha afectado, pero no comprendes los detalles de lo sucedido. El silencio subsiguiente es tan profundo como un pozo y está lleno de un terror tan siniestro como la negrura del fondo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous comprenez que vous subissez les effets de l'artefact, mais le détail des événements vous échappe. Le silence qui persiste a la profondeur d'un puits et renferme la même terreur que l'oppressante obscurité de celui-ci.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can tell you have fallen under the effects of the artefact, but you are unsure of the details of what just transpired. The remaining silence feels as deep as a well and full of the same dark terror as the blackness inside one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous comprenez que vous subissez les effets de l'artefact, mais le détail des événements vous échappe. Le silence qui persiste a la profondeur d'un puits et renferme la même terreur que l'oppressante obscurité de celui-ci.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du weißt, dass du dem Effekt des Artefakts ausgesetzt warst, kannst aber nicht genau sagen, was gerade passiert ist. Die jetzige Stille ist genauso umfassend von demselben dunklen Schrecken erfüllt wie die Schwärze zuvor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can tell you have fallen under the effects of the artefact, but you are unsure of the details of what just transpired. The remaining silence feels as deep as a well and full of the same dark terror as the blackness inside one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du weißt, dass du dem Effekt des Artefakts ausgesetzt warst, kannst aber nicht genau sagen, was gerade passiert ist. Die jetzige Stille ist genauso umfassend von demselben dunklen Schrecken erfüllt wie die Schwärze zuvor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eserin etkisi altına girdiğinin farkındasın ancak gerçekleşen şeylerin detayları konusunda pek emin değilsin. Geriye kalan sessizlik, bir kuyu kadar derin ve kuyunun içindeki siyahlıktaki karanlık dehşetin aynısıyla dolu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can tell you have fallen under the effects of the artefact, but you are unsure of the details of what just transpired. The remaining silence feels as deep as a well and full of the same dark terror as the blackness inside one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eserin etkisi altına girdiğinin farkındasın ancak gerçekleşen şeylerin detayları konusunda pek emin değilsin. Geriye kalan sessizlik bir kuyu kadar derin ve bir kuyunun içindeki siyahlıktaki karanlık dehşetin aynısıyla dolu.{/n}
